about_the_game:
Yandere Yuri Horror Visual Novel with Smooth Live2D Animations

Created with Live2D and TyranoScript, this yandere yuri horror game brings characters and scenes to life with fluid animations.
If you're a fan of yandere yuri horror, try this demo and experience the beginning of the story.

About the Demo Version

This is the DEMO version of the visual novel "Kimi to Kanojo no LILYVAGANZA."

In this demo, you can play up to MainChapter 2 of the main story, which consists of eight main chapters in the full game.

Nearly all character sprites and illustrations are animated with Live2D.

The full version includes voice acting, but this demo version does not feature voice acting.

All game controls are designed to be operated with a single left-click.

Notice

This story is a work of fiction.

It has no relation to actual people, organizations, or events.

All representations are for artistic purposes only and are not intended to promote criminal behavior.

We have confirmed that the game operates on the following minimum PC specifications in our possession:

[OS]Windows 11

[Processor]Intel Core i5-7300U CPU

[Memory]8.00 GB

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following:
- Bloodshed, Gory
- Extreme violence
- Suicide

name: Kimi to Kanojo no LILYVAGANZA Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300U CPU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720

short_description: This is a Yandere Yuri horror game where character sprites and still images move smoothly, created using Live2D and TyranoScript. If you enjoy Yandere Yuri horror filled with obsessive love, we highly recommend giving it a try.
